short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates the GPA and grades for Staples High School students

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to see your final grades and GPA on powerschool. To use, simply add the extension, and when you navigate to powerschool you will see your final grades in the F1 column.
